thread.title: Tariff bill in Congress puts heat on U.S. bag maker

title: Tariff bill in Congress puts heat on U.S. bag maker
text:
Tariff bill in Congress puts heat on U.S. bag maker 6:04am EST - 02:33 
As President Trump threatens a 'trade war', the U.S. Congress is considering a bill that would end tariffs on numerous imported products. But that's putting pressure on some U.S. manufacturers, such as Florida-based bag maker Korchmar.   
As President Trump threatens a 'trade war', the U.S. Congress is considering a bill that would end tariffs on numerous imported products. But that's putting pressure on some U.S. manufacturers, such as Florida-based bag maker Korchmar.  //reut.rs/2oPT4rH
